form.label: SplunkConf-Backup-Statut
form.description: Dashboard will only show hosts that are defined in splunkconf-backup-expected lookup. Please use lookup editor to fill it on the instance that you use to monitor Splunk (wont affect backup by itself)

input.label: Backup Time Check (should be adjusted to backup schedule)

search.query: |inputlookup splunkconf-backup-expected | search $fieldhost$ | eval object=mvappend("etc","scripts","kvdump","kvstore","state"), type=mvappend("local","remote") | mvexpand object | mvexpand type | join type=left host,type,object [search index=_internal $fieldhost$ source="*splunkconf-backup.log*" "splunkconf-backup" NOT "splunkconf-purgebackup" action=backup NOT result="running" | bin _time span=1d | stats count as nb,latest(_raw) , latest(result) as result , values(result) as list_result by type,host,object] | fillnull result value="missing" | eval result_id= case (result=="success",0,result=="unknown",1000,result="warning",100,1==1,1000) | rangemap field=result_id low=0-100 elevated=101-1000 default=severe | fields - result_id range | eval object2=case(object=="kvdump","kv",object=="kvstore","kv",1==1,object) | eventstats dc(object) as dcobject by host,object2,type | search NOT (dcobject=2 AND object="kvstore") | fields - dcobject,object2| rename result AS latest_result

index=_internal ($fieldhost$) source="*splunkconf-backup.log*" "splunkconf-backup" NOT "splunkconf-purgebackup" action=backup NOT result="running" | bin _time span=1h | stats count as nb,latest(_raw) , latest(result) as result , values(result) as list_result, latest(_time) as start by type,host,object,_time | fillnull result value="missing" | eval result_id= case (result=="success",0,result=="unknown",1000,result="warning",100,1==1,1000) | rangemap field=result_id low=0-100 elevated=101-1000 default=severe | fields - result_id range | eval object2=case(object=="kvdump","kv",object=="kvstore","kv",1==1,object) | eventstats dc(object) as dcobject by host,object2,type | search NOT (dcobject=2 AND object="kvstore") | fields - dcobject,object2| eval label=host."_".object."_".type | eval label=type | eval range=case(result=="success","low",1==1,"severe" ) |eval group=host."_".object |rename result AS latest_result
